subject: for wgungfu Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: The Ghost Box, is training required?
author: wgungfu
full_text:
Yah, I think starting small though with judging where interest lies in
just this group's members is a good start.  How many people are on
this list now anyways?

Marty

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, black bear hollow
<blackbearhollow@...> wrote:
>
> Yeah. MeetUp.com charges a monthly fee to use their site. It's not  
> much. You can do the same by contacting different forums and hanging  
> fliers. Even small ads in newspapers. Grocery store bulletin boards  
> work well too.
> 
> w
> ‡•ê
